00005 #include "CRay.h"

00010 #define Sprite g_pGfxEngine->Sprite

00012 CRay::CRay(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00013   direction_t dir, object_t byType, size_t byID,
00014   size_t speed) :
00015 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_RAY),
00016 m_Direction(dir),
00017 m_speed(speed)
00018 {
00019  m_type = OBJ_RAY;
00020  owner.obj_type = byType;
00021  owner.ID = byID;
00022 
00023  size_t Episode = g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode();
00024  if(Episode == 1) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP1;
00025  else if(Episode == 2) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP2;
00026  else if(Episode == 3) sprite = OBJ_RAY_DEFSPRITE_EP3;
00027 
00028  this->x=x;
00029  this->y=y;
00030 
00031  CSprite &rSprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00032  bboxX1 = rSprite.m_bboxX1;  bboxX2 = rSprite.m_bboxX2;
00033  bboxY1 = rSprite.m_bboxY1;  bboxY2 = rSprite.m_bboxY2;
00034 
00035  state = RAY_STATE_FLY;
00036  inhibitfall = true;
00037  performCollisions();
00038 }

00049 void CRay::process()
00050 {
00051  std::vector<CObject*>::iterator it_obj;
00052  switch(state)
00053  {
00054   case RAY_STATE_FLY:
00055    moveinAir();
00056    break;
00057   case RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT:
00058    setZapped();
00059    // ... and fall through
00060   case RAY_STATE_ZAPZOT:
00061    gotZapped();
00062    break;
00063  }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CRay::setZapped()
00067 {
00068  state = RAY_STATE_ZAPZOT;
00069  zapzottimer = RAY_ZAPZOT_TIME;
00070 
00071  size_t Episode = g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode();
00072  if (Episode==1)
00073  {
00074   if (rnd()&1)
00075   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP1; }
00076   else
00077   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP1; }
00078  }
00079  else if (Episode==2)
00080  {
00081   if (rnd()&1)
00082   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP2; }
00083   else
00084   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP2; }
00085  }
00086  else
00087  {
00088   if (rnd()&1)
00089   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZAP_EP3; }
00090   else
00091   { sprite = RAY_FRAME_ZOT_EP3; }
00092  }
00093 
00094  if (m_Direction==LEFT || m_Direction==RIGHT)
00095   moveUp(2);
00096  else
00097   moveLeft(4);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void CRay::gotZapped()
00101 {
00102  if (zapzottimer == 0) exists=false;
00103  else zapzottimer--;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CRay::moveinAir()
00107 {
00108  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00109  CSprite &raysprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00110  bool hitlethal;
00111 
00112  if (m_Direction == RIGHT)
00113  {
00114   // don't go through bonklethal tiles, even if they're not solid
00115   // (for the arms on mortimer's machine)
00116   if (TileProperties.at(mp_Map->at(((x>>(CSF-4))+raysprite.getWidth())>>4, (y>>CSF)+1)).behaviour == 1)
00117    hitlethal = true;
00118   else if (TileProperties.at(mp_Map->at(((x>>(CSF-4))+raysprite.getWidth())>>4, ((y>>(CSF-4))+(raysprite.getHeight()-1))>>(CSF-4))).behaviour == 1)
00119    hitlethal = true;
00120   else
00121    hitlethal = false;
00122 
00123   if (blockedr)
00124   {
00125    state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00126    canbezapped = false;
00127    if (onscreen)
00128     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00129   }
00130   moveRight(m_speed);
00131  }
00132  else if (m_Direction == LEFT)
00133  {
00134   if (TileProperties.at(mp_Map->at((x-1)>>CSF, (y+1)>>CSF)).behaviour == 1)
00135    hitlethal = true;
00136   else if (TileProperties.at(mp_Map->at((x-1)>>CSF, ((y>>(CSF-4))+(raysprite.getHeight()-1))>>(CSF-4))).behaviour == 1)
00137    hitlethal = true;
00138   else
00139    hitlethal = false;
00140 
00141   if (blockedl)
00142   {
00143    state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00144    canbezapped = false;
00145    if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00146   }
00147   moveLeft(m_speed);
00148  }
00149  else if (m_Direction == DOWN)
00150  {
00151   if (blockedd || blockedu)
00152   {
00153    state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00154    canbezapped = false;
00155    if (onscreen) g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SHOT_HIT, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00156   }
00157   moveDown(m_speed);
00158  }
00159 }
00160 
00161 void CRay::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00162 {
00163  if(hitdetect(theObject) && !theObject.dead && !theObject.dying)
00164  {
00165   if(theObject.canbezapped && state ==  RAY_STATE_FLY )
00166   {
00167    // Check, if it's not form the same object
00168    if(theObject.m_type != owner.obj_type)
00169    {
00170     state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00171     canbezapped = false;
00172     theObject.getShotByRay();
00173    }
00174   }
00175  }
00176 }
00177 
00178 void CRay::getShotByRay()
00179 {
00180  state = RAY_STATE_SETZAPZOT;
00181  canbezapped = false;
00182 }

00184 
00185 bool CRay::isFlying()
00186 { return (state==RAY_STATE_FLY); }
